title: bhuvana mOhanamA
sahitya:
bhuvana mOhanamA mAyaiyil pughuttiyun pOdaDi marandiDap-puriyEl puriyEl


anupallavi

  avuNar shiram koidE alangal aNindadEvi mauna nilai pughunda mAdhavan sattiyE


caraNam    annai unaiyallAl Arenai maDi vaittE ArvamuDan aNaittE AdarippAr shollAi 
ennai ivvAzhvilum yaman varum pOzhdilum engum iDar varAmal innaruLuDan kAvAi
